description:
A 2 bedroom townhouse with generous size 138 sqm (approx.) A sleek expression of modern style, this brand-new townhouse delights the senses with quality appointments and a free-flowing interior that connects effortlessly with the outdoors, only meters from the vibrancy of shops, restaurants and trains.

Focused on high fashion, the living and dining is detailed with sleek floorboards and accompanied by a gourmet kitchen boasting stone benches, Bosch gas stove, Bosch oven, Bosch dishwasher, double sinks plus a breakfast bench.

Virtually illuminating the separation between inside and out, stacker doors stretch across the living zone and offer a wonderful link out to the landscaped courtyard.

Upstairs two large bedrooms with fitted build-in-robe and dual access bathroom. A large balcony provides an extra outdoor space for enjoy.

Stylishly enriched with black tap and handle embellishments, carpet to bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling tiles and stone benches in bathrooms, split system heating/air conditioning, high ceilings, LED downlights, water tank, garden shed, under stair storage plus a single garage.

Placed peacefully at the rear of the complex, a short stroll from Bayswater Village, Bayswater Train Station, Bayswater Primary, Bayswater Secondary and Marie Wallace Park, near Dandenong Creek Trail, Westfield Knox and EastLink Freeway.
